description:
A folded end on this cunning nut tool reduces pain when pounding out stuck gear with the palm of your hand.

  • Precision tip ground for removing the tiniest gear from the most insipient slots
  • Wire gate for clipping direct to harness
  • Large holes keep the weight down
  • Removable, extendible leash and clip to prevent accidental loss
name: Wild Country Pro Key Nut Tool
